ygData.subject: Re: Ore and stones in/near Qeynos?
ygData.msgSnippet: Pretty much the easiset stones for you to get would be Freeport.  I make a weekly run from FP to Qeynos to fill my bank inventory with boxes full of ore and
ygData.messageBody:
Pretty much the easiset stones for you to get would be Freeport. I make a
weekly run from FP to Qeynos to fill my bank inventory with boxes full of
ore and sharpening stones. I of course sell these for a slight markup in
Qeynos to make it worth my effort, but if you can't find, or don't want to
deal with a middle man, just find a way to the forge in North Freeport.

Azerael
Monk of the Fourteenth Circle
Student/Teacher of the Yengtao School
Tarew-Marr Server


-----Original Message-----
From: Kelly [mailto:pruett@...]
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 7:25 AM
To: Blacksmith List
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Ore and stones in/near Qeynos?


From: Kelly <pruett@...>

Can anyone tell me the closest locatin for ore and sharpening stones to
Qeynos? Thanks in advance for help.



-Faderic of Qeynos (Ellorisis Marr)
